title: World briefs: Oil train derailment fund OK’d
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: World - Today 
PORTLAND, Maine — A U.S. bankruptcy judge on Friday approved a $338 million settlement fund for victims of the fiery 2013 oil train derail...
